LanguageData.Apparello_chefglove.label: 烤箱手套
LanguageData.Apparello_chefglove.description: A pair of heat resistant oven mitts for cooks.
LanguageData.Apparello_Workglove.label: 皮手套
LanguageData.Apparello_Workglove.description: A pair of hardened leather gloves, commonly used by most craftsmen.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gloves_Plated.label: 板甲手套
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gloves_Plated.description: A gloves made from leather and containing steel plates. Clearly designed for hand to hand combat.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gauntlets.label: 金属护手
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gauntlets.description: A pair of gauntlets, truly a necessity for hand to hand combat
LanguageData.Apparello_ReinforcedGlove.label: 加固手套
LanguageData.Apparello_ReinforcedGlove.description: Tyke Bison allegedly hid one of these under his boxing glove during a match. Luckily not a single blow was exchanged before Tyke had already bitten his opponent's nose off. The hit with the powered glove could of killed the poor man.
LanguageData.Apparello_Motorglove.label: 皮革拳套
LanguageData.Apparello_Motorglove.description: Fingerless leather gloves with real steady, gripping abilities. (Worn on both hands, 1st layer)
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gloves_Combat.label: 格斗手套
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gloves_Combat.description: Mass produced combat gloves made of Hyper-Weave and Plasteel inserts. Nano-stretch materials and contouring hyper-foam ensure a comfortable fit for any hand type while the nano-tactile receivers ensure a good no-slip grip. Military personal have often commented that the gloves feels like rubber covered in stickum. These gloves are truly a necessity for either hand to hand or ranged combat
LanguageData.Apparello_Snipeglove.label: 平稳手套
LanguageData.Apparello_Snipeglove.description: The antiswerve-adjustor installed in these gloves has made it a particular favorite of snipers.
LanguageData.Apparello_SoothingLove.label: 舒缓手套
LanguageData.Apparello_SoothingLove.description: Basic leather gloves rigged up with an intricate injection device with beautiful purple liquid inside. Soothes your nerves and lets you act in stressful situations.
LanguageData.Apparello_docglove.label: 医疗刀
LanguageData.Apparello_docglove.description: Rubbery and clinical. It has very sharp scissors strapped on it. What could possibly go wrong?
LanguageData.Apparello_docglovetwo.label: 医疗钳
LanguageData.Apparello_docglovetwo.description: Rubbery and clinical. It has very claspy pincers strapped on it.
LanguageData.Apparello_Snipeglovetwo.label: 卸货手套
LanguageData.Apparello_Snipeglovetwo.description: The microscopic exoskeleton in the gloves gives the wearer a quick and steady grip when squeezing the trigger.
LanguageData.Apparello_CalmingLove.label: 镇定手套
LanguageData.Apparello_CalmingLove.description: Basic leather gloves rigged up with an intricate injection device with glowing green liquid inside. Calms your nerves and lets you act in stressful situations.
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gauntlets_Techno.label: 纳米护手
LanguageData.MedievalTimes_Gauntlets_Techno.descripti: Custom made by Interstellar Industries, these high end combat gauntlets are made almost entirely of Nanite recursive Hyper-Weave and plasteel plating. These little alpha's come with Omega-weave electric stranding, thermo-dynamic assist functions and even nano-tactile receivers to ensure a good no-slip grip. Even with all that they found room for MilCo's patented Aim-Assist+. Nano-stretch materials and contouring hyper-foam ensure a comfortable fit for any hand type. These gloves are a favourite of any soldier lucky or rich enough that they can get their hands in them. Rarely seen outside of the most luxurious of glitter-worlds. These gloves are truly a godsend for either hand to hand or ranged combat
LanguageData.Apparello_Gamerglove.label: 力量手套
LanguageData.Apparello_Gamerglove.description: When you need your melee strikes to hit harder, you wear a pair of hex-cell fueled power gloves.
